ComicInfo.Summary:
Monsters from a Thousand Fathoms: Captain Random's son does not want to take up his father's career, but goes along on one voyage to prove that he will be of no use. However, his skills at hypnosis come in handy foiling an attempted mutiny.
Welcome Home, Killer!: A man is released after years in an asylum, supposedly cured of his murderous impulses. His sister-in-law plans to drive him mad again and make him kill his brother, but she is the victim instead.
Cry of the Death Bird: A terrorist seeks refuge in his late brother's home, where his nephew is dying. The legend of a giant black bird who carries people to their death comes true, taking the man instead of the boy.
ComicInfo.Title: Monsters from a Thousand Fathoms; Welcome Home, Killer!; Cry of the Death Bird
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Bob Toomey,Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Bob Toomey
